name: Pokémon Berry Blitz
description:
Pokémon Berry Blitz is a game I created using assets from the Pokémon Mystery Dungeon games. It builds on what I have learned while making Anubis Adventure.

You have 3 minutes to run around and collect as many berries as possible!

Controls:

Movement - Arrow keys

Attack - Space

Pause - P

This is my initial build of the game and is basically a case of "all the base components are working!" I plan to further expand on what I have created so far to improve on the base game.
